title: League of Legends not loading :S
body:
Hey, 

I'm running the latest version of windows 10 and I tried playing LoL but it won't run past the logo. Errors include PvP.net patcher kernel not working. Apparently LoL Launcher is uncompatible or something. Iv tried a heap of things to get it working but without success. Iv tried running in administrator and changing firewall settings

Anyone know a fix?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried running the launcher in compatibility mode?

Yes I have

It was installed in windows 10. I have tried running it in various versions of windows 7 and windows xp

I have, multiple times but after I followed the link to your full reinstall guide I have downloaded CC cleaner and am going to attempt it again. 

I had already deleted all files through microsofts cleanup software but it is worth a shot :) will reply when tested

You mentioned in your OP that you've tried running the game as Administrator, could you try that again except run it via the lol.launcher.admin.exe file in your league install directory (Default location: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends).

Let me know if that resolves the issue.

Sorry for the late reply

Id kind of given up on playing LoL sadly just because of the inability to access it

I have already done that, one of the first things I did was go into the folder and try all the .exe's in admin mode

Okay I have done a complete uninstall, ran CC cleaner and reinstalled. Same issue has occurred and running as administrator hasn't helped. I might try and see if there is a firewall issue

Edit: Firewall went nowhere. It is all allowed, I allowed the PVP patch kernel exe thingy permission as well as all of the update ones
